title.rendered: Wedding Dress Brand Stella York Exudes Glitz and Glamour in New Collection

content.rendered:
Show-stopping gowns for every bridal vision


Stella York Style 7573

LENEXA, Kan. - November 8, 2022 - (Newswire.com)

The stunning new wedding dress collection from Stella York delivers the hottest red carpet and runway-inspired styles for the aisle. Designed for the bride who wants to make a striking statement, the latest collection features on-trend silhouettes for an unforgettable—and fashionable—wedding day. 

"True love deserves to be celebrated, and the gorgeous new gowns from Stella York reflect the grand feeling of starting the next chapter of your romance," said Martine Harris, Chief Creative Officer of Stella York. "The latest collection from Stella York embodies glitz and glamour with every twist, turn and twirl." 

The new Stella York collection features eye-catching accents designed to let brides make a dazzling entrance. Sparkling embellishments, oversized bows and shimmering beading elevate each silhouette for the ultimate wow factor. Statement sleeves, head-turning trains, full and frothy skirts and layers of luscious tulle add a hint of dramatic flair to really push the bridal boundaries.  

Sexy design details give even the most traditional wedding dresses a chic, modern twist. Plunging necklines and sleek spaghetti straps highlight the décolletage, while sculpted and ruched bodices create an ultra-flattering effect. Leg slits also offer a trendy way to show a little skin on and off the aisle.  

The new collection features wedding dresses for every type of bridal style, from the classic bride who envisions wearing a beautiful, princess-inspired silhouette to the romantic bride who prefers an elegant and dreamy look on their wedding day. Discover all 29 new looks, now available at a retailer near you.   

The Stella York collection delivers on-trend wedding dresses for every size, budget and romance. Gowns are available in U.S. sizes 2 to 20, with many available in the EveryBody/EveryBride collection for U.S. sizes 22 to 34. To explore the entire collection or to find a store near you, visit www.stellayork.com. 

About Stella York 

Founded in 2013, Stella York is part of the Essense of Australia family of brands—and has since outfitted thousands of brides across the globe with its affordable, award-winning designer styles. Inspired by the world's hottest red-carpet trends, Stella York bridal gowns are imagined and handcrafted with stunning detail. Each gown is constructed to provide an exceptional fit and give the body perfect form, all at a competitive price. To find a retailer near you, visit StellaYork.com. 


Contact Information:
Lindsay Santee
Associate Director of Strategic Communications
lindsays@essensedesigns.com
9139098623


Press Release Service by Newswire.com

Original Source: Wedding Dress Brand Stella York Exudes Glitz and Glamour in New Collection
